attributes.action: Petition to ensure the boundary of Castle Bromwich remains in the Meriden constituency
attributes.additional_details:
In the latest proposals to redraw Parliamentary constituencies, it has been recommended that Castle Bromwich be subsumed into Birmingham Erdington.
As concerned citizens & members of the local Community, we urge our leaders to act now to keep Castle Bromwich in the Meriden constituency.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Boundary Commission for England not the Government, I suggest you contact them via their website.
